patterns: By whom was Laxmangarh founded or established
responses: Rao Raja of Sikar, Laxman Singh in 1862, founded Laxmangarh in 1864 in his own name.

patterns: Laxmangarh is famous for what places

responses: Sawant Ram Chokhani Haveli, Bansidhar Rathi Haveli, Sanganeria Haveli, Mirijamal Kyala Haveli, Char Chowk Haveli and Kedia Haveli. There is famous temple, i.e. The Radhi Murlimanohar temple

patterns: Is it true that there is a hotel on the top of laxmangarh fort?
responses: Although the fort is now a private property , but a temple over there is open to public.

patterns: Story behind dakniyo ka mandir in Laxmanghar

responses: It is said that the deity over there looks dangerous and hence the name

responses: Due to dangerous look of Shri NArshimha...

patterns: Something to know about that is not available on internet or normally we didn't heard of???
